name: Bubble Shooter Blast Ball Pop
description:
Download and play the awesome Bubble Shooter Blast game for FREE, hit the target and pop all the colored balls to win levels.
Match colors to crash bubbles and win points, beat all the challenges and solve the puzzles to level up and advance through the game. It’s fun and super addictive!
How to Play:
- Drag your finger to move the laser aim and lift it to smash bubbles.
- Match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to pop the group and win points.
- Explore hundreds of amazing levels in space.
- Blast and break all the balls to level up.
- Swap bubbles and plan your moves ahead.
- Complete the missions and solve all the bubble puzzles.
- Try getting 3 stars on every level by reaching high scores.
- Download now and enjoy the most classic and addictive gameplay.
- Drop 10 bubbles in a single shot to get a bomb that will burst the surrounding bubbles.
- Pop 7 bubbles in a row and to get a fireball that will cut through a pass.

Warm up your fingers and prepare for some bubble blasting fun! Journey through space and explore hundreds of galactic levels filled with awesome puzzles and challenges.

Play online or offline- no internet connection is required.
One thing you’ll definitely love about the game is that you can start any level over and not have to wait for lives, as they are unlimited!

Why You’ll Like It:
* Hundreds of challenging puzzle levels filled with colored bubbles.
* Amazing boosts and power-ups that will help you blast through the levels.
* Cool graphics and visual effects that make the entire gaming experience super fun!
* Pop and smash all bubbles to win levels.
* Fun for the whole family!
* Addictive Gameplay.
* Classic game mode.
* Shoot and burst all bubbles.
* Can you get 3 stars on every level? Play now and find out!

Love shooting bubbles in space? You’ll definitely love the exciting Bubble Shooter Blast game. Download to your iPhone device and enjoy the classic and popular bubble game with super cool puzzle levels.

Bash and blast the colorful balls in this fun puzzle game. Make sure to aim well so your bubble will land exactly where you want it. See which bubble color you are getting next so you can work out a strategy to pop your way to victory and clear all the bubbles from the screen. Match 3 colors to crash bubbles, hit the target & win levels!

Challenge yourself with hundreds of exciting levels as you advance through the game, and play anytime and anywhere you want, it’s completely free and totally addictive!
